name: Cerberus+1
flavor_text: "Because three heads are good, but four are better." —Jeza "Jeopardy" Verlayn

frame.name: Four-Headed Dog
frame.description: Shoots erratic bullets from all gun barrels at the same time.

perks.description:
Ranged shotgun barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Greatly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Rifled Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description: Aiming this weapon reduces the spread of its projectiles.
perks.name: Spread Shot Package
